sourcesContent:
Welcome to Sockets Io Chat Rooms

    {{room}}

    Users: 0/10

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SocketService } from 'src/app/services/socket.service'; import { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-rooms', templateUrl: './rooms.component.html', styleUrls: ['./rooms.component.css'] }) export class RoomsComponent { roomNames : string[] = []; roomName : string = ''; constructor( private socketService: SocketService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router, ) { } onCreateRoom(roomName : string) { this.roomName = ''; // this.router.navigate(['/room', roomName]); this.socketService.createRoom(roomName); } ngOnInit(): void { this.socketService.fetchRooms(); this.socketService.onFetchRooms().subscribe( (data:string[]) => { this.roomNames = data; } ); } }
